summary: User requests exposure of the existing but unused OperatorServiceClient in the PHP SDK to enable namespace deletion functionality without reimplementing BaseClient.
userImpact: Users cannot delete namespaces using the PHP SDK and must reimplement internal classes as a workaround.
rootCause: OperatorServiceClient exists in the SDK but is not publicly exposed or documented for user access.
proposedFix: Expose the OperatorServiceClient as a public API so users can directly use it for namespace operations.
workaround: Users can reimplement BaseClient to access OperatorServiceClient functionality.
keyQuote: There is already working OperatorServiceClient in the SDK, but it's not used anywhere, so in order to use it I need to reimplement BaseClient.
